skill_e.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking 25% less damage from area of effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for 1 second and deals 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.5) physical damage to them.

Counter Strike deals 20% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: 100% increased damage).

skill_i.tooltip: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

skill_q.tooltip: Jax leaps to target unit, dealing 65/105/145/185/225 (+1) (+0.6) physical damage if it is an enemy.

skill_r.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals ? additional magic damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him ? Armor and ? Magic Resist for ? seconds.

skill_w.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional 40/75/110/145/180 (+0.6) magic damage.
